title: After World Court's Arrest Warrant, Netanyahu Invokes 1894 Dreyfus Trial
content: Denouncing the International Criminal Court (ICC), Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu likened the court's arrest warrant against him to the infamous Dreyfus trial of 1894.
summary: Denouncing the International Criminal Court (ICC), Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu likened the court's arrest warrant against him to the infamous Dreyfus trial of 1894.

title: "Cannot Have Enough Of You": Guyana President Praises PM Modi's Leadership
content: Guyana President Mohamed Irfaan Ali praised PM Narendra Modi for his exemplary leadership and transformative impact on India's global stature.
summary: Guyana President Mohamed Irfaan Ali praised PM Narendra Modi for his exemplary leadership and transformative impact on India's global stature.

title: Wall Street Top Regulator To Quit After Trump Takes Office. Here's Why
content: US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) Chairman Gary Gensler will step down as Wall Street's top regulator at the end of the Joe Biden administration, he said.
summary: US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) Chairman Gary Gensler will step down as Wall Street's top regulator at the end of the Joe Biden administration, he said.

title: "Outrageous": Joe Biden Slams World Court's Arrest Warrant For Netanyahu
content: US President Joe Biden called the International Criminal Court's arrest warrants for top Israeli leaders "outrageous" in a statement on Thursday.
summary: US President Joe Biden called the International Criminal Court's arrest warrants for top Israeli leaders "outrageous" in a statement on Thursday.

title: US Man Receives Successful Face Transplant After Suicide Attempt
content: In the last 20 years, just a little more than 50 face transplants have been performed worldwide, which makes Mr Pfaff's operation a rare success.
summary: In the last 20 years, just a little more than 50 face transplants have been performed worldwide, which makes Mr Pfaff's operation a rare success.

title: Trump Picks Pam Bondi As US Attorney General After Matt Gaetz's Withdrawal
content: US President-elect Donald Trump tapped Pam Bondi, a staunch ally who helped defend the ex-leader against impeachment, as US attorney general following firebrand Matt Gaetz's withdrawal from the running.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump tapped Pam Bondi, a staunch ally who helped defend the ex-leader against impeachment, as US attorney general following firebrand Matt Gaetz's withdrawal from the running.

title: Attack On Awami League Member Shared As Assault On Bangladesh Hindu Woman
content: A video going viral on social media claims to show a Hindu woman bleeding down her face. The post claims she was a successful businesswoman in Bangladesh, with Muslim tenants.
summary: A video going viral on social media claims to show a Hindu woman bleeding down her face. The post claims she was a successful businesswoman in Bangladesh, with Muslim tenants.

title: TIME Magazine Shares Elon Musk's To-Do List, He Responds
content: Billionaire Elon Musk on Thursday responded to his "to-do list" featured on the cover of TIME magazine and said it was not his checklist.
summary: Billionaire Elon Musk on Thursday responded to his "to-do list" featured on the cover of TIME magazine and said it was not his checklist.

title: After Bibles And Watches, Trump Is Selling Autographed Guitars For $10,000
content: US President-elect Donald Trump has unveiled his latest merchandising venture, a line of branded acoustic and electric guitars, some of which are autographed.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump has unveiled his latest merchandising venture, a line of branded acoustic and electric guitars, some of which are autographed.

title: Never-Seen-Before Image Of Dying Star On Verge Of Supernova Captured
content: The star, identified as WOH G64, is located 160,000 light-years from us in the Large Magellanic Cloud and is on the verge of dying.
summary: The star, identified as WOH G64, is located 160,000 light-years from us in the Large Magellanic Cloud and is on the verge of dying.

title: Elon Musk Slams Australia's Plan To Ban Social Media For Kids Under 16
content: US billionaire Elon Musk, owner of social media platform X, has criticised Australia's proposed law to ban social media for children under 16 and fine social media platforms of up to A$49.5 million ($32 million) for companies for systemic breaches.
summary: US billionaire Elon Musk, owner of social media platform X, has criticised Australia's proposed law to ban social media for children under 16 and fine social media platforms of up to A$49.5 million ($32 million) for companies for systemic breaches.

title: North Korea's Kim Accuses US Of Escalating Tensions, Warns Of Nuclear War
content: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has accused the United States of ramping up tension and provocations, saying the Korean peninsula has never faced such risks of nuclear war as now, state media KCNA said on Friday.
summary: North Korean leader Kim Jong Un has accused the United States of ramping up tension and provocations, saying the Korean peninsula has never faced such risks of nuclear war as now, state media KCNA said on Friday.

title: Israel Strikes Kill 52 In Lebanon As Hezbollah Targets South Israel
content: Lebanon said Israeli strikes Thursday on the country's east and south killed 52 people, as raids also hit south Beirut and Hezbollah claimed its deepest attack on Israel in over a year.
summary: Lebanon said Israeli strikes Thursday on the country's east and south killed 52 people, as raids also hit south Beirut and Hezbollah claimed its deepest attack on Israel in over a year.

title: Putin Hints At Strikes On West In "Global" Ukraine War
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin said Thursday that the conflict in Ukraine had characteristics of a "global" war and did not rule out strikes on Western countries.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin said Thursday that the conflict in Ukraine had characteristics of a "global" war and did not rule out strikes on Western countries.

title: Legal Challenges Ahead For Google's Forced Sale Of Chrome
content: Efforts by US antitrust regulators to break up Alphabet by forcing a sale of its Google Chrome browser and other proposals to limit its search dominance are likely to run into legal challenges on grounds the remedies are extreme.
summary: Efforts by US antitrust regulators to break up Alphabet by forcing a sale of its Google Chrome browser and other proposals to limit its search dominance are likely to run into legal challenges on grounds the remedies are extreme.

title: UN's 35-Nation Nuclear Watchdog Board Passes Resolution Against Iran
content: The UN nuclear watchdog's board of governors passed a resolution chiding Iran's poor cooperation with the agency after hours of heated exchanges, diplomats told AFP late on Thursday.
summary: The UN nuclear watchdog's board of governors passed a resolution chiding Iran's poor cooperation with the agency after hours of heated exchanges, diplomats told AFP late on Thursday.

title: Brazil Police Call Ex-President Bolsonaro's Indictment Over 2022 "Coup" Plot
content: Brazilian police on Thursday called for the indictment of ex-president Jair Bolsonaro over a 2022 "coup" plot to prevent current leader Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva from taking office.
summary: Brazilian police on Thursday called for the indictment of ex-president Jair Bolsonaro over a 2022 "coup" plot to prevent current leader Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva from taking office.

title: World Leaders Split As ICC Issues Arrest Warrant For Netanyahu
content: Israel and its allies denounced the International Criminal Court's decision to issue an arrest warrant Thursday for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, even as Turkey -- and rights groups - welcomed the move.
summary: Israel and its allies denounced the International Criminal Court's decision to issue an arrest warrant Thursday for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu, even as Turkey -- and rights groups - welcomed the move.

title: Famous Iceland Geothermal Spa Covered In Lava Post Volcanic Eruption
content: Lava flowing from Iceland's latest volcanic eruption on Thursday engulfed the main parking lot of one of Iceland's biggest tourist attractions, the evacuated Blue Lagoon geothermal spa, images showed.
summary: Lava flowing from Iceland's latest volcanic eruption on Thursday engulfed the main parking lot of one of Iceland's biggest tourist attractions, the evacuated Blue Lagoon geothermal spa, images showed.

title: Netanyahu Says ICC Arrest Warrant Will Not Stop Israel Defending Itself
content: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Thursday that an arrest warrant issued against him by the International Criminal Court over his conduct of the Gaza war would not stop him defending Israel.
summary: Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said Thursday that an arrest warrant issued against him by the International Criminal Court over his conduct of the Gaza war would not stop him defending Israel.
